HelpBalloon.title: List-Split
HelpBalloon.content: The left-hand drop-down list is used to select the list split in per cent. E-Marketing Manager offers several default settings for frequently used list splits like for instance 15% / 15% /70%. In this example, the first mailing tranche will be sent to 15 per cent of subscribers registered, as will the second mailing. In a third mailing, the remaining 70 per cent will receive the mailing.
